briefdescription.para: Initializes a new instance of this class that can be used to save rendered images in the Tiff, Png, Bmp, Emf, Jpeg or Svg format. Png, Bmp, Jpeg or Svg format.
Creates a deep clone of this object.
Gets or sets the horizontal resolution for the generated images, in dots per inch.

detaileddescription.para: This property has effect only when saving to raster image formats and affects the output size in pixels.
The default value is 96.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the brightness for the generated images.

detaileddescription.para: This property has effect only when saving to raster image formats.
The default value is 0.5. The value must be in the range between 0 and 1.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the color mode for the generated images.

detaileddescription.para: This property has effect only when saving to raster image formats.
The default value is None.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the contrast for the generated images.

detaileddescription.para: This property has effect only when saving to raster image formats.
The default value is 0.5. The value must be in the range between 0 and 1.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets a value determining the quality of the generated JPEG images.

detaileddescription.para: Has effect only when saving to JPEG.

Use this property to get or set the quality of generated images when saving in JPEG format. The value may vary from 0 to 100 where 0 means worst quality but maximum compression and 100 means best quality but minimum compression.
The default value is 95.

briefdescription.para: Allows to specify how metafiles are treated in the rendered output.

detaileddescription.para: When Vector is specified, Aspose.Words renders metafile to vector graphics using its own metafile rendering engine first and then renders vector graphics to the image.
When Bitmap is specified, Aspose.Words renders metafile directly to the image using the GDI+ metafile rendering engine.

GDI+ metafile rendering engine works faster, supports almost all metafile features but on low resolutions may produce inconsistent result when compared to the rest of vector graphics (especially for text) on the page. Aspose.Words metafile rendering engine will produce more consistent result even on low resolutions but works slower and may inaccurately render complex metafiles.
The default value for MetafileRenderingMode is Bitmap.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the pages to render. Default is all the pages in the document.

detaileddescription.para: This property has effect only when rendering document pages. This property is ignored when rendering shapes to images.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the background (paper) color for the generated images. The default value is White.

detaileddescription.para: When rendering pages of a document that specifies its own background color, then the document background color will override the color specified by this property.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the pixel format for the generated images.

detaileddescription.para: This property has effect only when saving to raster image formats.
The default value is Format32BppArgb.
Pixel format of the output image may differ from the set value because of work of GDI+.

briefdescription.para: Specifies the format in which the rendered document pages or shapes will be saved if this save options object is used. Can be a raster Tiff, Png, Bmp, Jpeg or vector Emf, Svg.

detaileddescription.para: On different platforms, the supported formats may be different. The number of other options depends on the selected format.
Also, it is possible to save to SVG both via ImageSaveOptions and via SvgSaveOptions.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the zoom factor for the generated images.
Gets or sets the threshold that determines the value of the binarization error in the Floyd-Steinberg method. when ImageBinarizationMethod is ImageBinarizationMethod.FloydSteinbergDithering.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is 128.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets method used while converting images to 1 bpp format when SaveFormat is SaveFormat.Tiff and TiffCompression is equal to TiffCompression.Ccitt3 or TiffCompression.Ccitt4.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is ImageBinarizationMethod.Threshold.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the type of compression to apply when saving generated images to the TIFF format.

detaileddescription.para: Has effect only when saving to TIFF.
The default value is Lzw.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets a value determining whether to use GDI+ or Aspose.Words metafile renderer when saving to EMF.

detaileddescription.para: If set to true GDI+ metafile renderer is used. I.e. content is written to GDI+ graphics object and saved to metafile.
If set to false Aspose.Words metafile renderer is used. I.e. content is written directly to the metafile format with Aspose.Words.
Has effect only when saving to EMF.
GDI+ saving works only on .NET.
The default value is true.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the vertical resolution for the generated images, in dots per inch.

detaileddescription.para: This property has effect only when saving to raster image formats and affects the output size in pixels.
The default value is 96.

briefdescription.para: Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::ImageSaveOptions::get_HorizontalResolution.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::ImageSaveOptions::get_ImageBrightness.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::ImageSaveOptions::get_ImageColorMode.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::ImageSaveOptions::get_ImageContrast.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::ImageSaveOptions::get_JpegQuality.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::ImageSaveOptions::get_PageSet.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::ImageSaveOptions::get_PaperColor.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::ImageSaveOptions::get_PixelFormat.
Sets both horizontal and vertical resolution for the generated images, in dots per inch.

detaileddescription.para: This property has effect only when saving to raster image formats.

briefdescription.para: Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::ImageSaveOptions::get_SaveFormat.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::ImageSaveOptions::get_Scale.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::ImageSaveOptions::get_ThresholdForFloydSteinbergDithering.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::ImageSaveOptions::get_TiffBinarizationMethod.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::ImageSaveOptions::get_TiffCompression.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::ImageSaveOptions::get_UseGdiEmfRenderer.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::ImageSaveOptions::get_VerticalResolution.
Allows to specify additional options when rendering document pages or shapes to images.
